definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: stubborn, resentful, sullen, implacable;—[[סַר וְזׇעֵף]] 1Ki 20:43, 1Ki 21:4; f. [[מַה־זֶּה]] [[רוּחֲךָ סָרָ֫ה]] v:1Ki 21:5 why then is thy spirit sullen ? poss. also pl. cstr. [[סָרֵי סוֹרְרִים]] Je 6:28 revolters (stubborn ones) among, etc. (v. supr. and [[סור]]
